Team Section with Profiles.Layout: Grid layout featuring team member profiles, organized in responsive columns.
Team Section with Profiles.Design: Professional and approachable. Each team member is showcased with a photo and brief text description.

Key Elements.Section Header: Centered with a bold heading and brief introductory text.
Key Elements.Profile Grid: Responsive grid layout with rows of team member profiles.
Key Elements.Photo: Circular, high-quality images of team members.
Key Elements.Name and Title: Each profile includes the team member's name and position, styled for readability.
Key Elements.Responsive Design: Adjusts layout for different screen sizes to ensure optimal viewing experience.

Team Section with Profiles.Use Cases: Ideal for company about pages, agency websites, and any site aiming to highlight its team members and their roles.
